title: Implement backend REST API endpoints
description: Implement the `/api/v1` HTTP handlers for category management, expense management, and summary insights, including request validation and consistent error response mapping.
acceptance_criteria: All endpoints listed in docs/SPEC.md API requirements are implemented under /api/v1.
Validation errors return 400 with structured field-level details.
Not-found resources return 404 and business-rule conflicts return 409.
Insights summary endpoint returns total spend, expense count, and category grouped totals for a date range.
